name: Glow Worm (itch)
description:
Adventure game about infiltrating a mysterious organization. Use your mind to uncover their secrets.

Not a horror game. Unless you want it to be.

Controls

  • Keyboard Controls:
    • Directional Keys - move
    • Z/X/Spacebar - select/accept
    • C - cancel

First version created as month 10 of 12

  • Idea

Leave comments or send messages via email, twitter, or discord.

CREDITS

Music

"It's Glowtime!" by Vav
